verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ho, everyone that thirsteth,
Come ye to the waters.
He that hath no money,
Come ye, buy and eat.
Come, buy milk and honey.
Come, buy oil and wine.
He that hath no money,
Come ye, buy and eat.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A todos los sedientos
Venid a las aguas.
Los que no tienen dinero,
Venid, comprad y comed.
Venid, comprad leche y miel,
Venid, comprad aceite y vino.
El que est√© sin dinero,
Venid, comprad y comed.
